descriptions: ["DescriptionThis is a highly modern and convenient 1 BR (609 sq.ft) apartment with panoramic city and JLT views from both living room and bedroom. Silverene Towers The residential towers house 34 floors in Tower A and 25 floors in Tower B, accommodating lively community of residents. The base of the building is also home to a captivating mix of retail tenants secured by the adept planning of the Palma Asset Management team. Retail units include a Carrefour Market, an exclusive 24,000 sq. ft. health club and an exciting mix of Sushi, Lebanese and Seafood restaurant; giving its residents a unique lifestyle. Silverene is located in Dubai Marina, possibly the world's most exclusive waterfront development, where a stylish, sophisticated lifestyle has been created to delight its residents. In between the new Marina Mall and Al Majara community, Silverene enjoys boat harbours in front of the towers and is only minutes away from one of the region\x92s largest boat harbours. Amenities include: Large swimming pool Sun Deck and kids pool State-of-the-art gymnasium Retails stores on the promenade 24 hour building security Basement Parking Retail outlets in the building Palma Real Estate mission is to deliver boutique agency services across Dubai\x92s premium real estate market including Brokerage, Consultancy and Management Services."]

['DescriptionFIDU properties is pleased to offer you 1-bedroom apartment in Royal Oceanic Tower, Dubai Marina!
Some of the characteristics of the apartment:
•	BUA 786 sq. ft.
•	Lower floor
•	Kitchen equipped with built –in appliances
•	Spacious living room with natural light
•	South orientation
•	Community view with partial sea view
•	No road below the balcony
•	1 private parking place allocated to the basement
Designed for the demands of modern living, Royal Oceanic tower occupies one of the premier locations in Dubai Marina, standing tall between Le Royal Meridian, Habtoor Grand and Grosvenor House. 
The building has a health club with spa, sauna, Jacuzzi and steam rooms, an open air, temperature controlled swimming pool with separate children’s pool and play area, and a delightful barbecue area add to a sense of exclusivity.
Close to the public tram transportation and super markets, walking distance to the beach and Marina promenade, makes it and ideal choice for people who needs their privacy but be close to everything at the same time.
FIDU Properties is one of the most innovative and leading real estate agency in Dubai, we provide our clients a wide range of services, providing relevant and reliable information for residential, commercial and off plan properties.
You can contact us at +971525999999 for any enquiry.']

['DescriptionStrategically located between Abu Dhabi and Dubai, AlJurf is setting the pace and will be credited as the destination that introduced a truly unique concept to the UAE market, ushering in a new form of community living, and setting the future of life in Sahel El Emarat.  
Spanning over 380 hectares and boasting 1.6 kms of sea front and another 1.6 km of breakwater on the Arabian Gulf, AlJurf is a unique waterfront mixed-use development. The destination is anticipated to dramatically pave the way for Sahel El Emarat. 
Once completed, AlJurf will feature a range of facilities and amenities, including a world-renowned wellness clinic and retreat, unique residential communities and serviced residences, a marina and a town center encompassing a hotel and retail units. 
This is a second home destination, far from the bustle of urban life. AlJurf Gardens harnesses nature’s raw beauty and combines it with refined heritage-inspired architecture and contemporary design to present a sanctuary of wellness and calm. Secluded residential villas and land plots cluster close to a central community hub in the midst of a nature reserve to reinterpret The Great Past of Tomorrow.

descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']

["DescriptionNareel Island
​Nareel Island is a Plot Sales Development exclusively reserved for UAE Nationals​​.
Located off the Capital's coast in Al Bateen, Nareel invites the UAE's elite to create a personal legacy through a unique opportunity to purchase land and build a home for generations to come.
Nareel will be home to a tranquil yet active neighbourhood with a swimming lagoon, club house and open parks across the Island. It will further benefit from private beaches, pontoons, gardens and driveways creating an exclusive living experience for UAE families within a gated community.  
With 148 plots on the island, Nareel will truly be a limited opportunity reserved for a few UAE Nationals only.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi."]
